comments:
Build ID: M20060118-1600

Steps To Reproduce:
We have applied some latest Office2003 Hot fixes(more details in the MORE INFORMATION section)to some of our machines in our company. After that one of our main java application is throwing SWT Exception (on those machines)even after trying with the latest version of swt.jar.
We have found out the root problem and consolidates it in the form of attached zip file.
Steps to reproduce would be
1. Unzip the attached file( in C:\Outlook)
2. C:\Outlook>javac.exe -classpath swt.jar -d . *.java
3. C:\Outlook>set PATH=.;%PATH%
4. C:\Outlook>java -cp swt.jar;. TestOutlook

More information:
Exact Error thrown is:
Exception in thread "main" org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Action can not be performed. result = 1
        at org.eclipse.swt.ole.win32.OLE.error(OLE.java:342)
        at org.eclipse.swt.ole.win32.OleAutomation.invokeNoReply(OleAutomation.java:497)
        at arch.swing.ole.OleFactory$OleHandler.invoke(OleFactory.java:70)
        at $Proxy1.display(Unknown Source)
        at TestOutlook.main(TestOutlook.java:17)

The source code and Hot Fixes are attached.

Created an attachment (id=65896)
The Source Code

Created an attachment (id=65898)
It contains the list of Office2003HotFixes which are applied to machines on which the SWT error occurs

The Error explained would not occur on normal machines. Only the machines having the Patches/Hot Fixes mentioned in this XL file would throw this exception.

This issue is affecting one of our important releases.
Please get back to me if in case you need any more information.

Thanks,
Sumeet

This doesn't seem to be related to Eclipse webtools. 

John, can you move this one to Platform/swt.
Duong, please try hard to help these guys.  Recreate their problem and find me.  NOTE: They are shipping soon.
We currently don't have Office2003. I've ordered a copy but it'll take a few days to get here.
